DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect FODMAP content enteral nutrition ( EN ) formulas major gastrointestinal intolerance symptom nutritional status tube feed patient randomize , double blind placebo-controlled trial .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect FODMAP Content Tube Feeding Formula Feeding Intolerance Nutritional Status Improvement
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled study conduct 100 tube-fed patient . Over 14-day test period , test group consume EN formula contain low FODMAPs , placebo group consume EN formula contain moderate high FODMAPs .
DOC.criteria: tubefeeding patient EN prohibit renal dysfunction ( i.e . serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl blood urea nitrogen > 25 mg/ml ) liver dysfunction ( i.e . serum aspartate aminotransferase > 40 U/L alanine aminotransferase > 40 U/L ) uncontrollable diabetes mellitus pregnancy , breastfeed etc . severe diarrhea
